caption.p: CMIP5 multi-model ensemble average changes in winter precipitation ( a) frequency and ( b) intensity average in different percentile categories over the Mediterranean-climate grids (stippled region shown in Fig. 1a) by 2060–2089, relative to the historical period 1960–1989, using the RCP8.5 forcing scenario over the five global Mediterranean-climate regions. Figure was plotted using NCAR Command Language Version 6.3.0 (NCL; ref. 31).
